name: Sniper Bottles Game 3D
description:
Sniper Bottles Game 3D is an addictive, time-management, 3d shooting game, where you get to shoot, some amazing bottles placed at different positions and also the moving ones, by keeping the time in mind, using a sniper gun.

Features:
Aim and smash the real bottle.
Simple and Addictive Game play like free shooting games.
Extended Shooting experience.
Be accurate while shooting.
Move left & right to shoot more bottles.
High-quality 3d graphics.
Realistic sound of broken glass.
